TextView.android:text: Child Characteristics
Clild Internal ID

REVIEW THE ROSTER AND ASK TO SPEAK WITH THE MOTHER OR PRIMARY CAREGIVER OF EACH CHILD AGED 1 to 5 YEARS. A LOOP OR MULTIPLE COPIES OF THIS MODULE MAY NEED TO BE CREATED, SO THAT MULTIPLE CHILDREN AGED 1 to 5 YEARS, INCLUDING TWINS, CAN BE COLLECTED. IF A CHILD’S MOTHER/PRIMARY CAREGIVER IS NOT AVAILABLE AND AN APPOINTMENT CAN’T BE SCHDULED, ANOTHER ADULT HOUSEHOLD MEMBER WHO IS ABLE TO ANSWER ABOUT THE CHILD’S HEALTH MAY ANSWER AS PROXY.\nINTERVIEWER: Now, I would like to speak with the mother or primary caregiver of child/[name]. If you are the primary caregiver of child/[name], please allow me to ask you about child/[name]. If the mother or primary caregiver of child/[name] is not available now, when would be a better time return to speak with her? RECORD THE RETURN DATE __ __/__ __/__ __ __ __ (dd/mm/yyyy) AND RETURN TIME __ __: __ __ AM/PM If it is not possible to meet now or in the future with the mother or primary caregiver, then may I please speak with another adult household member who is able to answer about child/[name]’s health?
Record respondents individual ID number
Record child individual ID number

What is the relationship of the child/[name] to the household head?\n(CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 96) *Only include this question if relationship with the household head is not asked as part of the household roster*
Others specify
What is the primary caregivers relationship with the child/[name]?
Others specify
When child/[name] was born, was child/[name] very small, small, average, large, or very large?
Was child/[name] ill/unwell in the past two weeks?
Did the child/[name] have diarrhea (3 or more loose stools per day) in the past two weeks?
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s diarrhea?
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s diarrhea?

Did the child/[name] have an illness with a cough in the past two weeks?
Did the child/[name] have fast, short, rapid breaths or difficulty breathing in the past two weeks?
Was the fast or difficult breathing due to a problem in the chest or to a blocked or runny nose?
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s cough?
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s cough?
Others specify
Did the child/[name] have a fever (was the babe unusually hot to the touch) in the past two weeks?
Did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s fever?
Where did you/caregiver seek health care/treatment for the child/[name]s fever?
Other Specify
Has the child/[name] unintentionally lost weight lately?
Has the child/[name] had poor weight gain over the last few months?
Has the child/[name] been eating/feeding less in the past two weeks?
Is the child/[name] underweight?
Is the child/[name] overweight?
Have you ever vaccinated your child/[name]?
Do you have a card where child/[name]s vaccinations are written down?
May I take a photo of the vaccination card for child/[name]?
Did you ever have a vaccination card for child/[name]?
